revised_title: Anatomy and Feeding Habits of Marine Testaceous Mollusca
tldr: The author examines the anatomy and feeding habits of marine testaceous mollusca, focusing on three distinct modes of feeding: browsing, rasping, and gorging. The study provides detailed descriptions and illustrations of the dissection process and the various structures involved in the feeding process of Trochus crassus, Turbo littoreus, and Patella vulgata.
